item.description:
Hi Everyone,

THIS EVENT IS ALSO POSTED ON BOTH MY KAYAK AND FY SITES.
CHECK THERE FOR THE SAME OR OTHER PERSONS GOING.


Some members are going to Burlingame again this year.

If you are a maybee, you may not get the site you want if you wait too long to reserve

Last year i will admit was pretty good overall, we had a few sites nearby, i got to see what the Salt Ponds were. I won't be bringing my fleet of kayaks, but there will be a kayaking day to the salt ponds.


Details:

BURLINGAME CAMPOUT, Charlestown Rhode Island

Thursday, August 5 through August 12

A few of us are camping in Burlingame and have booked a site from Thursday to Thursday.

This is an invitation for you to join us.

We have selected Fishermans Area: Site # 302. Feel free to join us on all days or partial by booking your own site. -> see below for more info.

Campfires, potluck meals and shared laughs around the fire. Suggest booking one of the sites in the Fisherman's area, and then posting for others to share the site and cost of site with you. Last year we had a blast -- people will share with you. Up to 3 tents on each site is allowable

As of June 8: Available sites near our site #302: 124, 126, 128, 129, 305,306, 113 108, 109, 107. Book through: http://www.riparks.co... - scroll to RESERVATIONS. Cost is about $15/night.

Burlingame is centrally located to fantastic beaches and parks. Bring your bike or Kayak or both or neither. One of the members has offered to lead a mellow kayak trip on a salt pond. Definitely bring a tent and anything else that makes it comfortable for you to camp and or have fun! Some people car camp if they have vans.

If are booking then you have the option of sharing the site and cost by posting it on the comments section in our group site.

This promises to be another fun camping experience with new friends and old.

Hope to see you there!
Photos from last summer:
http://www.meetup.com...

USE THE BURLINGAME WEBSITE FOR FURTHER INFO AND DIRECTIONS IF YOU NEED THEM.
http://www.riparks.co...
item.how_to_find_us: Details will be discussed later and check/indicate campsite numbers..
